meanings.definition: People who share the same religion.
meanings.sent1: My coreligionists gather at the temple every Sunday.
meanings.sent2: She felt a strong bond with her coreligionists in the church.
meanings.sent3: The coreligionists organized a potluck to celebrate their beliefs.
meanings.sent4: In times of need, her coreligionists were her pillars of support.
meanings.sent5: The unity among the coreligionists was palpable during the religious festival.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who practice the same faith.
meanings.sent1: The coreligionists prayed together in harmony.
meanings.sent2: He found solace in the company of his coreligionists.
meanings.sent3: The coreligionists joked about their shared rituals.
meanings.sent4: Their bond as coreligionists was unbreakable, like a chain of faith.
meanings.sent5: The coreligionists stood united in their beliefs, a beacon of hope for others.
